summary: A cowboy doll is profoundly jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as the top toy in a boy's bedroom. When circumstances separate them from their owner, the duo have to put ... Read all
A magic board game summons jungle perils and a missing boy.
Just as John and Max resolve to save their beloved bait shop from turning into an Italian restaurant, its new female owner catches Max's attention.
Based on Terry McMillan's novel, this film follows four very different African-American women and their relationships with men.
George Banks must deal not only with his daughter's pregnancy, but also with his wife's.
